content: We talked last week, but also in the call few minutes ago, when we look, the strategic priorities are really to continue to have a clear focus on accelerating growth in our organic businesses, and looking at ways that we can kind of reposition and maybe redeploy some opportunities or capital there, but also what we do that, I think everybody in the room shares the view that we have a great opportunity to really start to focus on new business opportunities and new initiatives.
